snippet.title: Angry Birds Epic - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Angry Birds Epic: The game is free, download from Apple App Store, Google Play, Windows Phone Store and Amazon Appstore! http://download.epic.angrybirds.com

Angry Birds Epic -- the all-new role-playing adventure set on a fantasy Piggy Island! Find out more about the game and MAKE YOUR VERY OWN EPIC TRAILER at http://epic.angrybirds.com !

The greedy King Pig and his son Prince Porky have got their dirty trotters on the eggs, and it's up to our feathery heroes to save the day!

Play turn-based battles between the flock and the hogs across a fantasy Piggy Island -- from tribal villages and frosty mountains to tropical beaches and mysterious caves! Level up your characters and craft armor, weapons and potions to become a legendary hero ready to take on the mightiest pig warrior!

READ about Angry Birds at http://www.angrybirds.com
LIKE Angry Birds at http://facebook.com/angrybirds
FOLLOW Angry Birds at http://twitter.com/angrybirds
SUBMIT fan art at https://www.angrybirds.com/fans

Rovio Animation
Taku Suzuki -- Copywriter
Joonas Rissanen -- Director
Pavel Andonov -- Production Manager
Tuomo Kälviäinen -- Graphics
Jerome Dupre -- Logo Animation
Jussi Lehto -- Mastering
Mikko Paju / Tuukka Nikkilä -- Sound Design

Rovio Marketing
Eva Garces - Senior Illustrator
Scott McFarlane - Art Director
Stephen Porter - Senior Copywriter
Jalmari Auvinen - Community Manager
Phil Hickey - VP Marketing
Kai Torstila - Marketing Director

Fake Graphics
Sami Syrjä -- Creative Director / Lead Compositor
Mikko Perkiökangas -- Technical Artist
Markus Pansegrau -- Lead Digital Artist
Robin Grotenfelt -- Digital Artist
Felipe Peña Karvonen -- Digital Artist
Niko Rinta -- Digital Artist
Santeri Piilonen -- Digital Artist
Raine Kuusi -- Matte Artist
Mikko Rissanen -- Producer
Panu Kujala — Digital Artist
Iina Lehto — Digital Artist

Thanks:
Seepsula.fi
Sonja Huttunen -- Director of photography
Pauli Suuraho -- Matte paint fix
